segments.text: yes . How about going out and enjoying the sunshine on the grass ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: hey , darling , I think I might have a little heatstroke from being in the sun all day . I was so relaxed . It felt as if I were in another world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: exactly . You know , the sunshine and wind remind me of our honeymoon . You remember ? The island , the sound of the waves , the salty sea air and the sunshine ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , it was wonderful but it's already been a year . How time flies !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why not go again to celebrate out one-year anniversary ? We can go to the same beach , stay in the same hotel and enjoy a dinner in the same restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: are you kidding ? Can you afford it ? Do you think we can get a room on such short notice ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: never mind that , I'll take care of it . Are you available next week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . I'll make the arrangements . It will be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: wonderful ! I'll start packing our suitcases .
segments.speaker: S2
